alert.note: Alert for Bullock; Elmore; Macon; Montgomery; Pike; Tallapoosa (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 10 at 4:00PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Pike, southeastern Elmore, northwestern Bullock, western Macon, south central Tallapoosa and northeastern Montgomery Counties through 445 PM CDT... At 400 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hardaway, or 12 miles northwest of Union Springs, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Eastern Montgomery, Tuskegee, Tallassee, Union Springs, Notasulga, Milstead, Shorter, Franklin, Franklin Field, Reeves Airport, Lake Tuskegee, Emerald Mountain, Shopton, Waugh, Liverpool, Liberty City, Tallapoosa City, Hardaway, Mount Meigs and Tysonville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Bullock; Elmore; Macon; Montgomery; Pike; Tallapoosa
